_meta.purpose: High-Re RANS channel benchmark aligned with Nek5000 tutorial setup
_meta.reference: Nek5000 RANS tutorial (regularized k-omega / k-tau options)
_meta.notes: Primary benchmark target: high-Re RANS-vs-RANS comparison, not low-Re DNS

geom._comment: Half-channel [0,Î´] with symmetry at top. y_first is consistent with Ny=96, growth=1.05.

nondim._comment: Re_tau ~ O(10^3-10^4), intended to mimic high-Re RANS benchmark regime.

turb._comment_model: Use wilcox2006 to stay close to standard/regularized k-omega benchmark behavior.

benchmark._comment_reference: Optional external reference profile CSV from Nek run (columns: y_plus,u_plus[,k_plus]).
